originalData: United States, Veterans Administration Master Index, 1917-1940. Salt Lake City, Utah: FamilySearch, 2019.
sourceDescription: This collection contains a card index created by the Veterans Bureau (Veterans Administration) of veterans who served between World War I and earlier wars and who made (or whose heirs made) claims for benefits between 1917-1940 Learn more...
